discourse_list.title: An Unreal Primer on Real World Assets

content.content: Maker, in collaboration with @jackchong.eth of Frigg and Mukund Venkatakrishnan, I’ve published the Unreal Primer on Real World Assets, sponsored by Polygon, Ondo, and Bril Finance. It seeks to contextualize the history of RWA tokenization, why tokenization of RWAs is important/what it unlocks, and some predictions for where the industry is going (including a wild one about Flexport!) Finally, we illustrate a landscape which breaks out all the various protocols in the ecosystem into two categories: Infrastructuralists and Asset Specialists. We hope this serves as the household resource for anyone trying to get up to speed on what’s going on in our corner (growing to more of town square) of DeFi. My time at Maker and the colleagues I’ve collaborated with have of course been integral to the production of this resource. And for that I am in deep gratitude. For a Tweet thread outlining the Primer: Unreal Primer on Real World Assets Teej Tweet Thread For the full Primer: Unreal Primer on Real World Assets  Screen Shot 2022-10-04 at 10.51.24 AM1100×1204 96.1 KB
I saw when Jack posted this on Twitter! Haven’t had a chance to dig in yet but I am very excited to. Thanks for sharing your thoughts and expertise!
Exciting stuff. Learning a lot from the research; thank you!
